title: U.S. Joins EU In Sanctions Against China Over Treatment Of Uyghur Muslims
content:
1. U.S. Joins EU In Sanctions Against China Over Treatment Of Uyghur Muslims  NPR
  2. US and allies announce sanctions against Chinese officials for 'serious human rights abuses' against Uyghurs  CNN
  3. U.S., allies announce sanctions on China over Uyghur ‘genocide’  POLITICO
  4. U.S. U.K. and EU Sanction China Over Human Rights Abuse  Bloomberg Politics
  5. U.S. and Its Allies Sanction China Over Treatment of Uyghurs in a Collective Action  The Wall Street Journal
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
